ygData.subject: Twinking Discussion
ygData.msgSnippet: I can t believe this discussion has gone on this long.  Good grief.. if you don t like twinking don t do it and ignore those who do.  I, personally, don t have
ygData.messageBody:
I can't believe this discussion has gone on this long. Good grief.. if you don't
like twinking don't do it and ignore those who do. I, personally, don't have a
problem with it. Neither do I have any major heartburn about your position
against it. I do feel the discussion is getting old tho and am totally against the
name calling I see starting to occur. We are a group of human players behind
these wizard characters we've chosen to play. It is not necessary for others to
agree with your position.. in fact, I think it's pretty obvious that it's not going to
happen. Please rise above the name calling.

Thanks!

Iggie
Cazic-Thule
